Plot: Inventor Tim Jenison seeks to understand the painting techniques used by Dutch Master Johannes Vermeer.
Title: Tim's Vermeer
Actors: Tim Jenison, Penn Jillette, Martin Mull, Philip Steadman
tomatoConsensus: Entertaining and profound in equal measure, Tim's Vermeer uses its seemingly esoteric subject to pose fascinating questions about art and obsession.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
